channel.title: Hello I been having this problem XXX times now
channel.description:
I useally do not have Problems like this but RS2 does not have .jar therefor I create it using "apache ant" OBS :but not now!
Anyway to my error I have ALWAYS: [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
So It cannot find the Thing I understand that, however I have the same error when "trying to play" RS2PS. I tryed linking direct to the file, nothing really works I don't understand why .
Also tryed using jre/JDK same problem.

item.title: Hello I been having this problem XXX times now
item.dc:creator: @uberpk3r uberpk3r
item.description:
@uberpk3r wrote:

[quote=“antirock75, post:2, topic:382919”]You have to change the “main” method on you client.java.
If you are using refactored 317 client(galkons, project insanity etc.) then replace your main method in client.java with this one:

public static void main(String args[]) { try { nodeID = 10; portOff = 0; setHighMem(); isMembers = true; signlink.storeid = 32; signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); client client1 = new client(); client1.createClientFrame(505, 767); } catch(Exception exception) { } }[/quote]

How can that be possible, Like I said people with their client gives me the same error.

Read full topic
item.source: Hello I been having this problem XXX times now

item.title: Hello I been having this problem XXX times now
item.dc:creator: @antirock75 antirock75
item.description:
@antirock75 wrote:

You have to change the “main” method on you client.java.
If you are using refactored 317 client(galkons, project insanity etc.) then replace your main method in client.java with this one:

public static void main(String args[]) { try { nodeID = 10; portOff = 0; setHighMem(); isMembers = true; signlink.storeid = 32; signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getLocalHost()); client client1 = new client(); client1.createClientFrame(505, 767); } catch(Exception exception) { } }

OBS :but not now!

Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

So It cannot find the Thing I understand that, however I have the same error when “trying to play” RS2PS.
I tryed linking direct to the file, nothing really works I don’t understand why .
